name: Generator Config Stream Processor
description: Invokes a new generator for every DataPacket, which sends its data to a selected list of processors from a given config, replacing Tuktu config strings within.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the config so that you can follow it in the job overview.

parameters.name: node
parameters.description: The Tuktu SingleNode to execute on.

parameters.name: next
parameters.description: The processors to send the data into.

parameters.name: flow_field
parameters.description: Field containing the path of the flow to load relative to configs root folder; can contain variables which will be resolved with data packets' first datum.

parameters.name: send_whole
parameters.description: True sends the whole DataPacket, false sends each data object inside the DataPacket separately.

parameters.name: replacements
parameters.description: The replacements used to replace Tuktu config strings #{source} by target.

parameters.name: source
parameters.description: The #{key} that will be replaced by the target string below in the invoked configs: #{source} -> target. Can contain Tuktu strings to populate with first Datum.

parameters.name: target
parameters.description: The replacement for the source above: #{source} -> target. Can contain Tuktu strings to populate with first Datum.
